contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of the Netherlands}} '''General elections''' were held in the [[Netherlands]] on 14 June 1901.<ref name=NS>[[Dieter Nohlen|Nohlen, D]] & Stöver, P (2010) ''Elections in Europe: A data handbook'', p1395 ISBN 978-3-8329-5609-7</ref> The [[Liberal Union (Netherlands)|Liberal Democratic League]] remained the largest party, winning 26 of the 100 seats in the [[House of Representatives of the Netherlands|House of Representatives]].<ref>Nohlen & Stöver, p1412</ref> ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats !+/– |- |align=left|[[Liberal Union (Netherlands)|Liberal Democratic League]]||107,249||27.6||26||–22 |- |align=left|[[Anti Revolutionary Party]]||106,670||27.4||22||+5 |- |align=left|[[General League of Roman Catholic Caucuses]]||61,160||15.7||25||+3 |- |align=left|[[Social Democratic Workers' Party (Netherlands)|Social Democratic Workers' Party]]||36,981||9.5||7||+4 |- |align=left|Christian Historicals||26,233||6.7||10||+4 |- |align=left|[[Free-thinking Democratic League]]||23,398||7.3||9||+5 |- |align=left|Other parties||22,230||5.7||1||+1 |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes|| ||–||–||– |- |align=left|'''Total'''||'''389,021'''||'''100'''||'''100'''||'''0''' |- |align=left|Registered voters/turnout||609,634|| ||–||– |- |align=left colspan=5|Source: Nohlen & Stöver |} ==References== {{reflist}} {{Dutch general elections}} [[Category:General elections in the Netherlands|1901]] [[Category:1901 elections in Europe]] [[Category:1901 in the Netherlands]]
